name: get_flights_on_date
description: Search for one-way flights between two airports on a specific date. Returns flight options with prices, durations, and airline information.

arguments.name: seat_class
arguments.desc: Seat class (economy, premium-economy, business, first) (optional, default: economy)

name: get_round_trip_flights
description: Search for round-trip flights between two airports with departure and return dates. Returns flight options with prices, durations, and airline information for both legs.

arguments.name: seat_class
arguments.desc: Seat class (economy, premium-economy, business, first) (optional, default: economy)

name: find_all_flights_in_range
description: Search for flights across a date range to find the best options. Can search one-way or round-trip within specified date ranges. Optionally filter by maximum price.

arguments.name: start_date
arguments.desc: Start date of search range in YYYY-MM-DD format

arguments.name: end_date
arguments.desc: End date of search range in YYYY-MM-DD format

arguments.name: return_start_date
arguments.desc: Start date for return flights (optional, for round-trip)

arguments.name: return_end_date
arguments.desc: End date for return flights (optional, for round-trip)

arguments.name: seat_class
arguments.desc: Seat class (economy, premium-economy, business, first) (optional, default: economy)
